notes: Excellent modern apartment in pristine condition with high ceilings, large floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light, and quality finishes throughout. The space features polished tile floors, a well-equipped modern kitchen with ample storage, and minimalist furnishings. For baby safety, the floors are very slippery when polished and the balcony door in the bedroom may need childproofing; no visible stairs or dangerous railings observed.
